entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
